Rules","Accessibility","W3C"],"license":"MIT","lint-staged":{"*.{md,json,js,html}":["prettier --write","git add"]},"name":"act-rules-community","pulls":{"url":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/pulls"},"repository":{"type":"git","url":"git+https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io.git"},"scripts":{"build":"gatsby build","clean":"gatsby clean","createGlossary":"node ./build/create-glossary-usages","createImplementationsMetrics":"node ./build/create-implementation-metrics","createRulesUsages":"node ./build/create-rules-usages.js","createTestcases":"node ./build/create-testcases","develop":"gatsby develop","format":"prettier --write *.{json,md,js,jsx} './{_data,_rules,build,gatsby,pages,src,test-assets}/**/*.{json,md,js,jsx}'","formatRulesDir":"prettier --write './_rules/**/*.md'","getData":"npm run getWcagData && npm run createTestcases && npm run createGlossary && npm run createRulesUsages && npm run implementations","getImplementationAccessEngine":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Level Access' --tool 'Access Engine' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-access-engine/report.json'","getImplementationAlfa":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Siteimprove' --tool 'Alfa' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-alfa/report.json'","getImplementationAxeCore":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Deque Systems' --tool 'Axe-core' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-axe-core/report.json'","getImplementationQualWeb":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'LASIGE, Faculdade de Ciências da Universidade de Lisboa' --tool 'QualWeb' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-qualweb/reports/*.json'","getImplementationRgaa":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Access42' --tool 'RGAA 4.0' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-rgaa/reports/*.json'","getImplementationTrustedTester":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Trusted Tester' --tool 'Trusted Tester' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-trusted-tester/reports/*.json'","getImplementations":"npm run getImplementationAccessEngine && npm run getImplementationAlfa && npm run getImplementationAxeCore && npm run getImplementationRgaa && npm run getImplementationTrustedTester && npm run getImplementationQualWeb","getWcagData":"node ./build/get-wcag-data","implementations":"npm run getImplementations && npm run createImplementationsMetrics","prebuild":"npm run clean && npm run formatRulesDir && npm run getData","pregetImplementationAxeCore":"npm --prefix './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-axe-core/' run build -- --testsJson ${PWD}/_data/rules-testcases/testcases.json --testsDir ${PWD}/_data/rules-testcases --siteUrl $npm_package_www_url","pretest":"npm run getData","serve":"gatsby serve","start":"npm run clean && npm run develop","test":"jest --coverage"},"version":"1.0.0","www":{"url":"https://act-rules.github.io"}}
